description: Xcode is a free IDE Apple offers on the Mac App Store to provide tools for building, testing, deploying, and monitoring apps. As macOS developers build software with Xcode, they can save their progress as a project.

While Xcode saves projects as XCODEPROJ files, previous versions of the IDE saved projects as XCODE files. Information stored in the files includes source code, image files, and debug and release build settings.
